title: The Phantom Games : Dimensions Unknown 2020
description: 33 authors, musicians and artists from around the world … 16 insightful tales of Science Fiction and Fantasy … 17 eye-witness accounts of a real-life world under siege …  This anthology was planned as a celebration of the greatest sporting event in the world and its 2020 host country, Japan. After being heavily updated to reflect the changes that have turned things upside down, it’s now a document of how our lives have been transformed, and what we should expect in the immediate future. We are slowly awaking from the nightmare that was 2020 ... Let the Phantom Games begin.
author: John Paul Catton
